stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte form maintained with gangly limbs, fuzzy blue texture, and characteristic proportions. Byte appears as a light blue fuzzy blob with elongated limbs consistent with teen stage canonical appearance.

All props clearly separated and properly positioned.
